summary: Comprehensive testing of Wii Telecom ticketing system completed. All backend API tests (21/21) passed. Frontend/UI tests verified: admin login, SMS AM navigation restrictions, Voice AM navigation restrictions, SMS ticket form with all fields, Voice ticket form (correctly excludes SID/Content), status tabs filtering, date range filtering, and AM role restrictions.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

critical_code_review_comments: Add aria-describedby to Sheet/Dialog components for accessibility compliance
seed_data_creation: Test data created via pytest but cleaned up. Enterprise 'Acme Telecom' exists in database.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_wii_telecom.py cover auth, client management, SMS/Voice tickets, AM restrictions. Users am_sms, am_voice, noc_user, admin are seeded in database.

navigation_filtering.sms_am_sees_sms_only: PASS - SMS AM sees Dashboard, SMS Tickets, My Enterprises only
navigation_filtering.voice_am_sees_voice_only: PASS - Voice AM sees Dashboard, Voice Tickets, My Enterprises only
navigation_filtering.admin_sees_all: PASS - Admin sees all navigation items including Enterprises and Users

sms_ticket_fields.all_fields_present: PASS - SID, Content, Rate, Vendor Trunk, Cost, Is LCR, Root Cause, Action Taken, Internal Notes all present
sms_ticket_fields.client_vendor_role: PASS - Enterprise Role radio buttons (Client/Vendor) present

voice_ticket_fields.excludes_sms_specific: PASS - Voice form correctly excludes SID and Content fields
voice_ticket_fields.has_shared_fields: PASS - Rate, Vendor Trunk, Cost, Is LCR, Root Cause, Action Taken, Internal Notes present

status_tabs.unassigned_assigned_other: PASS - All three tabs visible with counts (4, 0, 1)
status_tabs.tab_switching: PASS - Tabs switch correctly and filter tickets

tested_features.date_range_filtering: PASS - Date range picker present and functional

am_restrictions.am_cannot_create_tickets: PASS - New Ticket button hidden for AMs
am_restrictions.am_cannot_update_tickets: PASS - API returns 403 when AM tries to update
am_restrictions.sms_am_cannot_access_voice: PASS - API returns 403 for SMS AM accessing voice tickets
am_restrictions.voice_am_cannot_access_sms: PASS - API returns 403 for Voice AM accessing SMS tickets

tested_features.complex_sorting: PASS - Tickets sorted by Priority → Volume → Opened Via as shown in UI
